alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Union County, Union and northeastern Claiborne Parishes through 500 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Strong to near Wesson. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Norphlet, Huttig, Junction City, Farmerville, Bernice, Strong, Mount Holly, Wesson, Lisbon, Urbana, Lawson, Cooley, Lapile, Marion, Felsenthal, Spearsville, Lillie, Newell and New London. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
